name: Thousand Layers
description: Very airy custard slices layered with cream

name: Hand-made Lamb Dumpling
description: A homemade, hand-folded dough, wrapping a savory all lamb filling.

name: Stir-fried Beans
description: String beans seasoned with mildly spicy dry chili

name: Bobas Milk Ice Cream Bar
description: Bobas Milk Ice Cream Bar with jelly fillings

name: Kavap
description: Marinated lamb kebabs made using a family recipe

name: Leek & Eggs Dumpling
description: Homemade vegetarian dumplings stuffed with egg, fresh chives, minced shrimp and glass noodles.

name: Meefen
description: Spicy house made chili paste stir fried with gluten free rice noddles, chicken and celery create an aromatic flavor

name: Not your Typical Honey Cake
description: Consists of layers os sponge cake with a cream filing and coating, is known for its lengthly preparation. It is decadent, beautiful and absolutely delicious. (serve with a scoop of ice cream)

name: Jahunger Noodles
description: Hand-pulled noodles topped with thin slices of beef, seasoned with a tongue-numbing secret sauce prepared using Sichuan peppercorns. With the right amount pf fresh chives, brings a touch of aromatic flavor to this amazing dish.

name: Asian Rice
description: A bowl of traditional Asian white rice.

name: Chicken Stew
description: Chicken, broad hand pulled noodles, so thinly sliced as to be nearly translucent, potatoes, and green peppers.

name: Home Made Yogurt
description: Home made yogurt topping with high-quality organic honey with curshed walnuts.
